mapper.select: select patid as "PatId",--系统自增加id cardid as "CardId",--身份证ID blcode as "BlCode",--病历号 name as "Name",--病人姓名 typeyb as "Typeyb",--医保类型 codeyb as "Codeyb",--医保代码 sex as "Sex",-- 性别 agetype as "AgeType",--年龄标识 age as "Age",--年龄 birthday as "Birthday",--出生年月 height as "Height",--身高（cm） weight as "Weight",--体重（kg） address as "Address",--家庭住址 telphone as "Telphone" --联系电话 from SI_MSPATINFO_MZ a,SI_MSSYINFO_MZ b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.blcode=b.blcode and a.orgcode =#{map.Hoscode} and b.gendate>=to_char(#{map.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gendate<=to_char(#{map.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
